Expert Service OptionsExpert technicians and advisors are ready to keep your vehicle in top running condition. Schedule Service


Flexible FinancingAt Hertz Car Sales we make car financing simple, flexible and secure. We deal with these top lenders, as well as others, to offer solutions that meet almost any budget. Explore Your Options


Value Your TradeWe can offer you a competitive offer for your vehicle!Get My Offer







Service You Can Count On 


When you need service, you'll get the best from your local service center, where we provide a variety of service coupons and have highly-qualified technicians ready to help, whatever your need. Your nearest finance center with Foundation Auto Colorado is ready to help secure the right deal and get the vehicle you and your family really need: just fill out an easy online application to get started, and someone will be in touch right away.Whether you want access to a wide variety of makes and models to find precisely the right car for you, need help to finance your new car purchase, want to get the best value for your trade-in, or need great maintenance and repair to keep your vehicle running smoothly and reliably, you'll find it all through the Foundation Auto Colorado family. Find directions to your local dealership and come see us today. We can't wait to help.






We Talk Finance and Service 


Whether you're looking for a safe, reliable SUV for the whole family, a powerful truck for work, or new cars for sale in Wheat Ridge CO that will turn heads wherever you go, Foundation Auto Colorado is your best new and used car dealership in Colorado. We're ready to help you find the vehicle you need, and we'll even take your trade-in at up to $250 more than CarMax. We pride ourselves on exceptional customer service, which means you'll always find the best deals, great service, thoughtful amenities, and a comfortable environment with us.Looking for something new this year? Something with all the best safety features, fuel economy, or luxury features? We have a diverse selection of new fan-favorite models from several of the best manufacturers, including Chevrolet, Cadillac, Hyundai, and Kia.Need a great deal on a used car? We also maintain a fantastic range of used and certified pre-owned vehicles that are both reliable and fun to drive.

ai_summarized_context:
The website belongs to Foundation Auto Colorado, a car dealership located in Wheat Ridge, Colorado, with additional locations in Boulder, Westminster, and Castle Rock. The primary purpose of the website is to provide information about new and used vehicles for sale, including various makes and models such as Cadillac, Chevrolet, Hyundai, and Kia. 

Key features of the website include:

- **Inventory Listings**: Sections for new inventory, used inventory, certified pre-owned vehicles, and electric vehicles.
- **Shopping Tools**: Options for financing, valuing trade-ins, and scheduling vehicle service.
- **Service and Parts**: Information about vehicle maintenance services, parts ordering, and service coupons.
- **Contact Information**: Phone numbers for sales and service departments at various locations.
- **Customer Service Focus**: Emphasis on exceptional customer service, flexible financing options, and a comfortable dealership environment.

Overall, the website aims to assist customers in purchasing vehicles, trading in their old cars, and maintaining their vehicles through service offerings.
